Write-Up Text: In the social media sphere a diverse range of people shared their thoughts on the latest Australian federal budget. Among these people were critics who slammed Rupert Murdoch's Australian publication for publishing fantasy tales and others who accused the Liberal National Party of lying about a potential budget-driven inflation. Meanwhile certain individuals promoted upcoming webinars express their concerns on accessibility to aged care and scrutinized banks for certain activities. Also noteworthy were comments made by the prime minister regarding the budget's reflection of labor priorities.
